headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Have it Both Ways
content: Do you ever start a gritty, downtown street race only to find yourself longing for the freedom of going point-to-point in a fighter jet? Have you ever been leading the pack in a cycle sprint down Vespucci Beach, but secretly wished you were going face first down Raton Canyon on a Seashark? Well, luckily for you, Transform Races will switch between land, sea and air in less time than it takes you to soil your drawers. Time to scratch that itch.
